rules.name: STOP
aspect: semaphore head:1 angle:90; light head:1 color:red; number-plate no

rules.name: STOP AND PROCEED
rules.indication: STOP, THEN PROCEED IN ACCORDANCE WITH RULE 509
aspect: semaphore head:1 angle:90; light head:1 color:red; number-plate yes

rules.name: APPROACH-RESTRICTING
rules.indication: PROCEED PREPARED TO ENTER TURNOUT OR TO STOP SHORT OF TRAIN OR OBSTRUCTION
aspect: semaphore head:1 angle:45; light head:1 color:yellow; number-plate no

rules.name: APPROACH
rules.indication: PROCEED PREPARED TO STOP AT NEXT SIGNAL; IF EXCEEDING MEDIUM SPEED, IMMEDIATELY REDUCE TO THAT SPEED
aspect: semaphore head:1 angle:45; light head:1 color:yellow; number-plate yes

rules.name: ADVANCE
rules.indication: PROCEED; APPROACH NEXT SIGNAL AT MEDIUM SPEED
aspect: semaphore head:1 angle:45; light head:1 color:yellow; number-plate no

rules.name: CLEAR
aspect: semaphore head:1 angle:0; light head:1 color:green
